<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Harming Hands](/Feats.aspx?ID=4645) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 114 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[harmful font](/Classes.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

The mordant power of your void energy grows. When you cast [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1552), you roll d10s instead of d8s.
name: Harming Hands
